level.heading: Transfer by gift or exercise of power of appointment.
level.text: A person may make a transfer by irrevocable gift to, or the irrevocable exercise of a power of appointment in favor of, a custodian for the benefit of a minor pursuant to section 21-309.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in § 21-309, § 21-315, § 21-318, and § 21-320.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 6-87
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-87, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 21-301.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 4 of the Uniform Transfers to Minors Act.
